SEARCH

Class LibrarianControllerTest

java.lang.Object
LibrarianControllerTest
public class LibrarianControllerTest extends Object
Comprehensive Integration Test Suite for the LibrarianController class.

This suite verifies the core functionality of the Librarian Dashboard, including transaction management (borrow/return), file persistence, data parsing, user membership validation, and UI visual states. It utilizes Java Reflection to inspect private state and invoke private methods, ensuring maximum code coverage.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab

  • Constructor Details

    • LibrarianControllerTest

      public LibrarianControllerTest()
      Default constructor for the test class.

  • Method Details

    • initToolkit

      @BeforeAll static void initToolkit()
      Initializes the JavaFX Toolkit required for testing UI components. This method ensures the toolkit is started only once for the entire test execution.

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws Exception
      Sets up the test environment before each test case. Initializes the controller instance, injects mocks, and ensures a clean file system state.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection or file operations fail.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown()
      Cleans up external resources and temporary files after each test execution.

    • initializeMocks

      private void initializeMocks() throws Exception
      Initializes and injects all mock UI components into the controller.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection fails.

    • testInitialize_FullFlow

      @Test void testInitialize_FullFlow() throws Exception
      Verifies the complete initialization flow. Ensures that table columns are bound correctly and data is loaded from the file system.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection or initialization logic fails.

    • testHandleBorrowBook_Scenarios

      @Test void testHandleBorrowBook_Scenarios() throws Exception
      Validates the borrowing transaction logic. Covers scenarios for: missing selection, attempting to borrow an already borrowed item, and a successful borrowing transaction.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection or business logic fails.

    • testHandleReturnBook_Scenarios

      @Test void testHandleReturnBook_Scenarios() throws Exception
      Validates the return transaction logic. Covers scenarios for: missing selection, attempting to return a non-borrowed item, and a successful return transaction.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection or business logic fails.

    • testHandleSearch_Scenarios

      @Test void testHandleSearch_Scenarios() throws Exception
      Tests the search filter functionality. Verifies that the table updates correctly based on keyword matches and resets when the search field is empty.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection fails.

    • testHandleReload_and_FileParsing

      @Test void testHandleReload_and_FileParsing() throws Exception
      Tests robustness of data loading and file parsing. Verifies that the system correctly identifies different Media types (Book vs CD) and gracefully handles malformed numeric data without crashing.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection or file I/O fails.

    • testOverdueFineCalculation_withUserMembership

      @Test void testOverdueFineCalculation_withUserMembership() throws Exception
      Verifies the interaction between overdue items and user membership levels. Ensures that the system attempts to calculate fines for overdue items based on the borrower's membership type retrieved from the user database.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection or file I/O fails.

    • testGetUserMembership_Fallbacks

      @Test void testGetUserMembership_Fallbacks() throws Exception
      Tests the fallback logic for retrieving user membership. Ensures that the system defaults to "Silver" membership if the user file is missing or the specific user cannot be found.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection fails.

    • testHandleLogout

      @Test void testHandleLogout() throws Exception
      Verifies the logout mechanism. Ensures that the UI transition logic is triggered without errors, even in a headless test environment.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection fails.

    • testRowColoring

      @Test void testRowColoring() throws Exception
      Tests the TableView RowFactory implementation. Validates that rows are assigned the correct CSS styles based on the Media item's status (Available, Borrowed, Overdue).
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection fails.

    • testSetCurrentUsername

      @Test void testSetCurrentUsername() throws Exception
      Verifies that setting the current username updates both the internal state and the welcome label on the UI.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection fails.

    • cleanupFiles

      private void cleanupFiles()
      Deletes temporary test files.

    • createDummyBooksFile

      private void createDummyBooksFile(String content) throws IOException
      Creates a dummy books file with the specified content.
      Parameters:
      content - The CSV content to write.
      Throws:
      IOException - If writing fails.

      Parameters:
      content - The CSV content to write.
      Throws:
      IOException - If writing fails.

    • injectField

      private void injectField(String name, Object value) throws Exception
      Injects a mock object into a private field of the controller.
      Parameters:
      name - The field name.
      value - The mock object.
      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection fails.

    • getPrivateField

      private Object getPrivateField(String name) throws Exception
      Retrieves the value of a private field from the controller.
      Parameters:
      name - The field name.
      Returns:
      The field value.
      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection fails.

    • invokePrivate

      private Object invokePrivate(String name, Object... args) throws Exception
      Invokes a private method on the controller.
      Parameters:
      name - The method name.
      args - The method arguments.
      Returns:
      The return value of the method.
      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection fails.
